document_data.caption: A map showing the Naval Yard of Skuld outlined in red.
document_data.name: Naval Yard of Skuld
document_data.mainbody: The '''Naval Yard''' was a walled section of the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Naval Yard was situated in the southwest corner of Skuld. It was bordered on the west by the [[Alamber Sea]] and on the north by the [[River of Shadows]].
document_data.Description: Aside from the docks, access to the Naval Yard was granted via a gate to the southeast, and to the north via the [[Bridge Gate (Skuld)|Bridge Gate]].
document_data.Activities: Vessels from Mulhorand's decrepit navy used the Naval Yard exclusively.
